Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.starter.bakery.backend.service.ProductService
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudService<Product>, FilterableCrudService<Product>
@Service public class ProductService extends Object implements FilterableCrudService<Product>
Service class for managing Product entities. Provides CRUD operations and filtering capabilities for products in the bakery application. This service implements FilterableCrudService to support paginated and filtered queries.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bakery Application

  • Method Details

    • findAnyMatching

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> findAnyMatching(Optional<String> filter, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds products that match the given filter criteria with pagination support. If a filter is provided, searches for products with names containing the filter text (case-insensitive). If no filter is provided, returns all products.
      Specified by:
      findAnyMatching in interface FilterableCrudService<Product>
      Parameters:
      filter - optional filter string to search for in product names
      pageable - pagination information including page number, size, and sorting
      Returns:
      a page of products matching the filter criteria

    • countAnyMatching

      public long countAnyMatching(Optional<String> filter)
      Counts the number of products that match the given filter criteria. If a filter is provided, counts products with names containing the filter text (case-insensitive). If no filter is provided, returns the total count of all products.
      Specified by:
      countAnyMatching in interface FilterableCrudService<Product>
      Parameters:
      filter - optional filter string to search for in product names
      Returns:
      the number of products matching the filter criteria

    • find

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Product> find(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of products with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      pageable - pagination information including page number, size, and sorting
      Returns:
      a page of products

    • createNew

      public Product createNew(User currentUser)
      Creates a new product instance. This method is called when creating new products in the application.
      Specified by:
      createNew in interface CrudService<Product>
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user creating the product (not used in this implementation)
      Returns:
      a new empty product instance

    • save

      public Product save(User currentUser, Product entity)
      Saves a product entity to the database. Handles data integrity violations by throwing a user-friendly exception when attempting to save a product with a duplicate name.
      Specified by:
      save in interface CrudService<Product>
      Parameters:
      currentUser - the user performing the save operation
      entity - the product entity to save
      Returns:
      the saved product entity
      Throws:
      UserFriendlyDataException - if a product with the same name already exists
